<small>Aramaic form: [[H6173]]</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרָה‎</span>] **verb** ==be naked, bare== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be naked***; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ערה‎</span> [Pi\`el] ***lay bare*** (compare [[BDB#Bloch|Bloch]] [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]); Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ûru***</u></abbr>, ***nakedness***, also ***desert waste*** (compare [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרָה‎</span>] below) Jäger<sup>BAS ii. 282 and references</sup>; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶרְוָה‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִירְיְתָא‎</span>; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in Lexicons); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֵרָה‎</span> [[Isa.22.6|Isa 22:6]]; [[Zeph.2.14|Zeph 2:14]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְעָרֶה‎</span>[[Isa.3.17|Isa 3:17]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַהְּעַר‎</span> [[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]] 2 masculine singular jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּעַר‎</span> [[Ps.141.8|Ps 141:8]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וִיעָרוּ‎</span> [[2Chr.24.11|2Chr 24:11]] ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָ֫רוּ‎</span> [[Ps.137.7|Ps 137:7]] (twice in verse); ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרוֺת‎</span> [[Hab.3.13|Hab 3:13]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75n»§ 75n</sup>); — 

**1.** ***lay bare*** [[Isa.3.17|Isa 3:17]]; [[Isa.22.6|Isa 22:6]]; [[Zeph.2.14|Zeph 2:14]] (indefinite subject); of laying foundations bare, i.e. tearing down walls, etc. [[Hab.3.13|Hab 3:13]] (yet on text see [[BDB#Now|Now]]), absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָ֫רוּ עָ֑רוּ‎</span> [[Ps.137.7|Ps 137:7]] (twice in verse). 

**2.** ***lay bare*** by removing contents, ***empty***, water-jar [[Gen.24.20|Gen 24:20]] ([[BDB#J|J]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location), chest [[2Chr.24.11|2Chr 24:11]]. 

**3.** ***pour out***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתְּֿעַר נַפְּשִׁי‎</span> [[Ps.141.8|Ps 141:8]] (i.e. slay). **Hiph\`il** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׃ הֶעֱרָה‎</span> 

**1.** ***make naked***, of sexual offences [[Lev.20.18|Lev 20:18]]; [[Lev.20.19|Lev 20:19]] (both \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גִּלָּה‎</span>). 

**2.** ***pour out***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַמָּוֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשׁוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.53.12|Isa 53:12]] (figurative for ***slay***, compare **Qal 3**). **Niph\`al** passive of **Hiph\`il 2 :** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵעָרֶה עָלֵינוּ רוּחַ‎</span> [[Isa.32.15|Isa 32:15]] (figurative) until ***there be poured upon us a spirit*** from on high. 

**Hithpa\`el 1.** ***Imperfect*** 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְעָרִ֑י‎</span> [[Lam.4.21|Lam 4:21]] ***thou shalt make thyself naked*** (of Edom under figure of drunken woman). 

**2.** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְעָרֶה‎</span> [[Ps.37.35|Ps 37:35]] usually ***pouring himself***, i.e. ***spreading himself out*** like a tree ([[BDB#Bae|Bae]] doubts; [[BDB#Du|Du]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְעַלֶּה‎</span> ***lifting himself up***, compare [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]).
